definitions.definition: Any of the 20 species of the genus Galanthus of the Amaryllidaceae , bulbous flowering plants , bearing a solitary , pendulous , white, bell-shaped flower that appears, depending on species , between autumn and late winter or early spring , all native to temperate Eurasia .
Alternative letter-case form of Snowdrop ( “ a Royal Air Force police officer ” ) .

main_definition: Any of the 20 species of the genus Galanthus of the Amaryllidaceae , bulbous flowering plants , bearing a solitary , pendulous , white, bell-shaped flower that appears, depending on species , between autumn and late winter or early spring , all native to temperate Eurasia .
